rds.vaadin.beanfaces.utils

Class FieldFactoryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • rds.vaadin.beanfaces.utils.FieldFactoryHandler

  • public class FieldFactoryHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Default field factory handler. Custom factories can be added for a specific entity by using addFactory(Class<?> key, FieldGroupFieldFactory value).
    Author:
    Raphael Rougemont
